events.message: I recently purchased a laptop from your store, but I want to request a refund because it doesn't meet my expectations and I need to return it.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's mention of return and refund.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer regarding their recent laptop purchase.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your recent laptop purchase. Iâ€™m here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for requesting a refund so we can process your request quickly?
My order number is 123456789. The laptop does not have the specifications as advertised, and it is not functioning as expected.
Thank you for the information. We can initiate a full refund for your laptop. Please send it back using the pre-paid return label we will email you shortly.
Thank you for your help. I appreciate the quick response and will send the laptop back as soon as I receive the return label.
We have sent the pre-paid return label to your email. Once we receive the laptop, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
This is a follow-up to confirm if you have returned the laptop and if you need any further assistance regarding your refund.
Yes, I have mailed the laptop yesterday using the return label. Thank you for your support throughout the process.
We have confirmed receipt of the laptop and processed your refund. The case is now closed. Please contact us again if you have any other concerns.
